meanings.definition: A device used to measure electrical resistance.
meanings.sent1: The ohmmeter showed how much resistance the wire had.
meanings.sent2: I used the ohmmeter to check the resistance of the circuit.
meanings.sent3: The ohmmeter and the wire had a little chat about resistance.
meanings.sent4: The ohmmeter was a detective, uncovering the secrets of electrical resistance.
meanings.sent5: With a beep, the ohmmeter revealed the resistance of the component.

meanings.definition: The act of measuring electrical resistance using an ohmmeter.
meanings.sent1: He performed an ohmmeter test to check the resistance.
meanings.sent2: The technician's job involved a lot of ohmmeter readings.
meanings.sent3: The ohmmeter competition was intense among the electricians.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an ohmmeter, calculating every resistance.
meanings.sent5: The classroom echoed with the sound of students using the ohmmeter.
